jobDescription: Job Details POSITION SUMMARY/RESPONSIBILITIES Responsible for the management, database development, data management, analysis and results interpretation/reporting and oversight for a variety of Health System projects. Analyst will be responsible for project management, maintains a good working relationship with all staff members and key stakeholders. EDUCATION/EXPERIENCE BS/BA degree required. MS/MA/MBA degree preferred. Minimum of two years experience in a health care setting is preferred. Experience conducting analyses on large databases and prior use of claims is preferred. Must be knowledgeable in patientSDL2017
